_comment: Approved agents allowlist for commit author validation
_usage: This file contains the list of approved GitHub Apps and bot accounts that are authorized to commit to this repository

_fields.id: Unique identifier for this agent entry
_fields.username: GitHub username of the agent (human-readable name)
_fields.githubAppId: GitHub App ID (numeric) - null for non-App bots
_fields.type: Agent type: GitHubApp, ServiceAccount, or Bot
_fields.description: Human-readable description of the agent's purpose
_fields.approvedBy: GitHub username of person who approved this agent
_fields.approvedDate: ISO 8601 date when agent was approved
_fields.permissions: Array of operations this agent is allowed to perform
_fields.enabled: Boolean indicating if agent is currently active

agents.description: GitHub Copilot coding agent for automated code changes
GitHub web UI for merge commits and web-based edits
